Posts.Content: Hi, very nice to meet you all in this forum, my wife was diagnosed with breast cancer triple positive DCIS in 2011, treated with chemo and surgery, after two years she was on remission, but then they found that she has brain metastasis, we are looking for people with Breast cancer Brain Mets ONLY(BCBM) who are taking any supplement, drug, or some kind of therapy that can also help my wife . She has been with the best doctors, still don't know whats the best next step . So we want to take control of her disease and find some support here and also share what it helped and helps us.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer with Brain Mets ONLY!
